variations.template: This ability triggers after the clash ends.
rts: This ability triggers after the clash ends.

variations.template: Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on their choice of the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a greater mana value.
rts: Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on their choice of the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a greater mana value.
